passage_text: Names for Leopard Tortoises. Size of Leopard Tortoises. On average, leopard tortoises reach about 10-18 inches long (with some subspecies growing to be up to 30 inches long) and weigh in at about 40-50 pounds (although some can weigh up to 70 pounds). The leopard tortoise is the second largest tortoise that is native to Africa (with the African spurred tortoise/sulcata tortoise being the largest). passage_text: Leopard Tortoise Life Span. Leopard tortoises live between 50 and 100 years in the wild. Leopard Tortoise Caging. The preferred setup for adult leopard tortoises is outdoors. However, if you live in a climate too cold for such an enclosure, you may house the tortoise indoors. A pair of leopard tortoises can be kept in a 10 foot by 10 foot pen.
